roleset.name: beginning, origination
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls.

example.name: with agent
example.text: Thus, 9 years after their inception of the program, Garfinkle and Klawitter (1992) reluctantly conclude that "routine income withholding will increase child support payment by only a modest amount ... it is no panacea" (p.248).

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: Pastor Lindsey Williams, former minister to the global oil companies during the building of the Alaskan pipeline, announced the most significant event to affect the U.S. dollar since its inception as a currency.
